t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Reference number of drawing under the facility

Facility/base currency equivalent of the drawing
Rate used at the time of drawing for conversion

Indicates the customer of the new drawing
Indicates the base currency exchange rate

Indicates the incremental amount
Indicates the new aggregate amount

Share of the participant in the base currency
Value date of the rolled over drawing
Indicates maturity date
Interest to be paid in advance or in arrears
Indicates the type of interest rate to be used
Nominal rate if actual interest rate is not input
Reference number of rolled over (new) drawing
Indicates the method by which accrual is to happen
Indicates the rounding rule
Indicates the interest day basis
To Capitalise the interest or not
Customer for whom delivery message is to be sent
Indicates activity code
indicates the date on which activity is generated
Change product event on the date stated
